items.title: ChongLy Scott Thao, Hmong Immigrant and U.S. Citizen, Arrested by ICE
items.description: A Hmong immigrant, who is a U.S. citizen, was released after being questioned for an hour. Federal officials said they had been seeking sex offenders.

items.description: People across a large section of the central and eastern United States are facing predictions for heavy snow and ice starting Friday.
